ygData.subject: Re: Enchanter Army.
ygData.msgSnippet: geez, you make it sound like such a downer.┬á hehe ┬á we could all die together anyway (in an upbeat kind of way) ... From: Daniel Devorkin
ygData.messageBody:
geez, you make it sound like such a downer.∩┐╜ hehe
∩┐╜
we could all die together anyway (in an upbeat kind of way)

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Devorkin [mailto:devo@...]
Sent: Saturday, May 22, 1999 2:24 AM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Enchanter Army.


hate to bust your bubble, but our pets suck, and they wont attack unless
we get hit, so an army of enchanters going into a camp, rooting, then
getting beat up so our pets can attack, then they die, then we die.
∩┐╜
∩┐╜

----- Original Message -----
From: Mushin
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Sent: Friday, May 21, 1999 4:02 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Enchanter Army.

OK I will make an attempt to change the tone of this gourp.
∩┐╜
I would like to form an enchanter Arm and march into battle with some
enemy race. What I invision is an entire army of invisible Enchanter
marching righ into the Enemy camp and out of no where summoning our pets
and routing every one in sight.∩┐╜ Imagine multiple squads of 6 suddenly
becoming 12∩┐╜ as we summon. Imagine marching to justwithin casting range
and rooting every enenmy then casting∩┐╜ DOT spells while another unit
moves in for with pets and finishes them up. If anyone of you would like
to experiment with this let me know. I also think that it would make
people think about the powers of enchanters. We do have some of the best
spells out there but we have to use them a little more creatively.
∩┐╜
Thanks
Mushin
∩┐╜
